name: UltraTouch Denim Insulation Multi-Purpose Roll
description: The UltraTouch Denim Insulation Multi-Purpose Roll provides insulating performance for many around the house uses. Simply cut or tear to size to accomplish small insulating jobs or craft projects. Manufactured from recycled cotton fibers, the UltraTouch Denim Insulation Multi-Purpose Roll is the safe and sustainable choice.Manufactured from 100% recycled denimNon-itch material allows for easy and satisfying installationSuperior thermal and acoustical performanceLots of uses around the home, ranging from sealing areas around doorways to sealing gaps around air conditioning unitsR6.7 for energy saving performance
